channel.title: HKG:489 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:489 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Dongfeng Motor Shares Surge on Privatization, Unit List Plan
item.description: Dongfeng Motor Group Co.’s Hong Kong-listed shares surged the most in six months after the Chinese automaker announced long-awaited restructuring plans that will see it refocus on the electric vehicle

item.title: Dongfeng Motor Shares Surge on Privatization, Unit List Plan
item.description: Dongfeng Motor Group Co.’s Hong Kong-listed shares surged the most in six months after the Chinese automaker announced long-awaited restructuring plans that will see it refocus on the electric vehicle

item.title: Dongfeng Motor to Sell 50% Stake in Joint Venture with Honda
item.description: State-owned Chinese automaker Dongfeng Motor Group Co. is selling its 50% stake in a joint venture with Honda Motor Co., in a reflection of the country’s rapid shift away from gasoline-powered vehicle

item.title: Dongfeng Motor to Sell 50% Stake in Joint Venture with Honda
item.description: State-owned Chinese automaker Dongfeng Motor Group Co. is selling its 50% stake in a joint venture with Honda Motor Co., in a reflection of the country’s rapid shift away from gasoline-powered vehicle
